data.name: 0000 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I left interviewing the computer club to Nagato while the rest of us met up with Haruhi.

data.name: 0001 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ah—where'd Yuki go?

data.name: 0002 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Which I then explained to her.

data.name: 0003 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #DP

data.name: 0004 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Upon hearing this, Haruhi took on a ponderous expression and sunk into silence.

data.name: 0005 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't tell me—she suspects that we might be hiding something from her?

data.name: 0006 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I needed some kind of excuse to distract her... But before I could think of one—

data.name: 0007 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I guess there's no point in all of us searching in one group.

data.name: 0008 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: —Our Miss Brigade Leader said with a decided look.

data.name: 0009 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Why did you suddenly say such a thing?

data.name: 0010 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When I heard that Yuki left to interrogate the club, something zapped my mind!

data.name: 0011 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't know what could "zap your mind," but it seems like it was just some idea.

data.name: 0012 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From here we should all split up and search on our own!

data.name: 0013 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait wait—what about my sister?

data.name: 0014 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll take the little sister with me.

data.name: 0015 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm glad you'll look after her at a time like this, but I'm not sure I can feel at ease about it.

data.name: 0016 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya, what sort of procedure should we use to search by?

data.name: 0017 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well after deciding the meet up time, I guess we'll just split into groups and look around.

data.name: 0019 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eehh—we all just scatter around the school alone...?

data.name: 0020 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly. Like how Yuki went to investigate on her own.

data.name: 0021 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I get what you mean buut…

data.name: 0022 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru—don't tell me you're scared?

data.name: 0023 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: N-no…

data.name: 0024 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You don't have to push yourself or anything, but you're not scared are you?

data.name: 0025 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehh, I-I'm not………

data.name: 0026 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina is like a single daisy blowing in the strong wind.

data.name: 0027 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So small and trembling and frightened...

data.name: 0028 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh right—I managed to overhear something interesting.

data.name: 0029 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I wonder what it could be?

data.name: 0030 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A certain somebody said they we're walking down a corridor with no signs of anyone else—

data.name: 0031 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And after that heard the sound of a different set of footsteps following along.

data.name: 0033 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eek!

data.name: 0034 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And then, after feeling the mysterious presence of someone else, and turning around...

data.name: 0035 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There was nobody there at all.

data.name: 0036 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0W-waaah...

data.name: 0037 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With that unnecessarily vivid narration, Asahina is turning pale.

data.name: 0038 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi—Haruhi!

data.name: 0039 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What?! I'm just getting to the good part!

data.name: 0040 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And so, after thinking that they were just imagining things, again the footsteps—

data.name: 0041 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Wwawawa— #SK0h-how is that possible???

data.name: 0042 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Indeed, but that's not all—

data.name: 0043 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: After getting a bad feeling and looking back behind them a bunch…

data.name: 0044 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0A-after looking back…？

data.name: 0045 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From a place that nobody should have been...#W30

data.name: 0046 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A human face appeared out of nowhere!

data.name: 0047 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hyyyaaaaa!?

data.name: 0048 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina just might faint from the shock of that ghost story.

data.name: 0050 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And in addition to that—

data.name: 0051 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey—that's enough of that. Don't scare Asahina any further.

data.name: 0052 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She was about five seconds away from bursting into tears because of your story.

data.name: 0053 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And if something like that actually happened, I wouldn't be able to bear it!

data.name: 0054 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Jeez—it was just getting exciting. Don't ruin it!

data.name: 0055 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But, well—we are burning daylight, so I'll leave it off there.

data.name: 0056 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is that what you have to say after stirring up so much fear? What a person.

data.name: 0057 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aaaahhhh, I-is it over? Thank goodness.

data.name: 0058 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now that the story is over, Asahina finally seems to be comfortable.

data.name: 0059 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So like I was saying—as originally planned everyone spread out and search around!

data.name: 0060 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeeeh—! N-not again...

data.name: 0062 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Roger that.

data.name: 0063 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey—that's not a good idea.

data.name: 0064 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: First you scare people then you send them out alone—

data.name: 0065 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How cruel can you be… It's not the first time this has happened either.

data.name: 0066 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um… Is it okay if I at least go together with Kyon?

data.name: 0067 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Yes—why of course Miss Asahina. I'd love to go out with you.

data.name: 0068 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No. Rejected. Absolutely not. That would be terribly inefficient.

data.name: 0069 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: C'mon c'mon, get moving already! You got that Mikuru!?

data.name: 0070 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aaaah—whyyy…

data.name: 0071 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina resisted until the very end—

data.name: 0072 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But she was no match for Haruhi's pushing.

data.name: 0073 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So we went off in different directions by ourselves.

data.name: 0074 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: —Is what should've happened at least.

data.name: 0075 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Hold on!

data.name: 0076 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Mm? H-hey—what are you doing?!

data.name: 0077 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just as I started to walk, Haruhi suddenly pulled me away from view.

data.name: 0079 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06It seems that from now on, we here will be taking special action.

data.name: 0080 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Before I knew it Koizumi appeared. What happened to Asahina?

data.name: 0081 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06We need Mikuru to become like the protagonist of a horror movie.

data.name: 0082 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06What? What's that supposed to mean?

data.name: 0083 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06We'll follow behind her while filming stealthily.

data.name: 0084 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06We should be able to get some really nice shots.

data.name: 0085 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What a poor-taste girl—and why we're doing this, I have no idea.

data.name: 0086 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Quit your grumbling. Hurry—go follow Mikuru!

data.name: 0087 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Understood.

data.name: 0088 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Oi—wait up!

data.name: 0089 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't just let Haruhi do as she pleases.

data.name: 0090 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I had no choice but to accompany them.

data.name: 0091 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: By the way, why did you suddenly decide to record such a thing?

data.name: 0092 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's probably pointless to ask for a solid reason—but just in case, I did anyway.

data.name: 0093 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Why not? It's good to document official SOS Brigade activities isn't it?

data.name: 0094 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It was the idea I had awhile back—beautiful girls are an absolute must for horror.

data.name: 0095 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm following that classic approach!

data.name: 0096 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So I thought we should try looking for a new appeal in Mikuru.

data.name: 0097 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even without looking for it, Asahina's appeal is more than satisfactory.

data.name: 0098 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Actually—where did you even get that video recorder from in the first place?

data.name: 0099 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No matter what you say—you have some terrible hobbies.

data.name: 0100 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You don't understand at all.

data.name: 0101 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's important to look at things from an outside-the-box perspective isn't it?

data.name: 0102 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What nerve to say such a thing while making this awful recording of a terrified Asahina.

data.name: 0103 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As expected—Miss Suzumiya's way of thinking differs from the average person.

data.name: 0104 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi—you really shouldn't idly butter up Haruhi. She'll end up taking advantage of you.

data.name: 0105 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just like that, us dubious stalkers followed Asahina in secret…

data.name: 0108 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aaaaah—I-it must just be my imagination… That slight sound of footsteps that aren't mine…

data.name: 0109 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If three amateur spies are tailing you, it's only natural to hear footsteps.

data.name: 0110 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: T-there's no one else there… Right?

data.name: 0111 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm just worried that she'll look behind her as we're advancing.

data.name: 0112 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Uuh—I just remembered that story from before… What should I do…

data.name: 0113 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Yes—nice facial expression, Mikuru! Good. That's right on the mark!

data.name: 0114 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Every time Asahina freaks out, you're there to gleefully record it. Shameless.

data.name: 0115 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But even I must admit—The sight of a startled young lady isn't bad at all.

data.name: 0116 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I thought something along those lines to myself. Reflection may be required.

data.name: 0117 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But then again, right now Asahina seems far too miserable.

data.name: 0118 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I should probably do something about it…

data.name: 0119 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahi—#W60

data.name: 0120 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0HYYYAAAA! A v-voice!?

data.name: 0121 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah—

data.name: 0122 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's terrified. Was that counterproductive?

data.name: 0123 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeek!

data.name: 0124 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She was in such a hurry that she seemingly stepped on something and fell over.

data.name: 0125 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oooch. I-it hurts—

data.name: 0126 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Nice going, Mikuru! You're a perfect clumsy girl!

data.name: 0127 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ah, I was trying to reassure her—but I did something wrong instead…

data.name: 0128 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: By the way—what could Asahina have stepped on?

data.name: 0129 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Eh? This is what tripped you over? I wonder who's #P05handkerchief#P00 this is?

data.name: 0130 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I think I'll hold on to this for the time being.

data.name: 0131 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Koizumi—I'm starting to feel too bad for Asahina.

data.name: 0132 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06You should also tell Haruhi to call this off.

data.name: 0133 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06That's quite troubling I'm afraid…

data.name: 0134 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06While I do feel bad for Miss Asahina, I don't believe it's a good idea to interrupt now.

data.name: 0135 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06And why not?

data.name: 0136 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06If we put an end to Miss Suzumiya's fun now…

data.name: 0137 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06She may still be unsatisfied.

data.name: 0138 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06And I take it you're saying that then causes closed space to form.

data.name: 0139 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Yes—precisely.

data.name: 0140 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Due apologies to Miss Asahina, but let's just watch over her closely for now.

data.name: 0141 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If it were me, I'd only get chills from being watched closely by this guy.

data.name: 0143 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey guys, what are you doing over there!?

data.name: 0144 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't dawdle or you'll lose sight of Mikuru!

data.name: 0145 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just because I can't help her doesn't mean I wont watch out for her.

data.name: 0146 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The least I can do is stop Haruhi from getting further out of control…

data.name: 0147 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: C'mon—we need to get closer.

data.name: 0148 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If we get too close she may notice us.

data.name: 0149 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But when you try to record while zoomed in the camera shake is terrible.

data.name: 0150 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like he said, we shouldn't get too close.

data.name: 0151 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Uuuuum, I-is anyone there…?

data.name: 0152 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Everybody hide—!

data.name: 0155 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-w-who's there?

data.name: 0156 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I told you so. Asahina seems to have noticed us.

data.name: 0157 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Whew… There's no one… #W30What do I do, I'm scared—

data.name: 0158 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina is petrified in place—completely terrified.

data.name: 0159 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I might have to put an end to Haruhi's ill-natured playtime soon.

data.name: 0160 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina…

data.name: 0161 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: $4#SK0NOOOOOOOOOOOO!! F-FACE!!

data.name: 0162 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Errh—!

data.name: 0164 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It hurts… Asahina's hands went for my face…

data.name: 0165 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aah! Kyon!

data.name: 0166 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nice going Mikuru! I was able to snap the ultimate facial expression!

data.name: 0167 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeh… You we're taking pictures of me?

data.name: 0168 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're exceedingly cute, Mikuru!

data.name: 0169 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …That's mean.

data.name: 0170 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi looks ecstatic, but…

data.name: 0171 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's eyes on the other hand are utterly dejected.

data.name: 0172 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For the record—I'm fairly dejected too.

data.name: 0173 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll have to edit this video thoroughly later!

data.name: 0174 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Haha—It'll be a blast.

data.name: 0176 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm certain it'll be a wonderful video once it's completed.

data.name: 0177 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just what are you looking so happy about—Koizimi?

data.name: 0178 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's see if you can keep up that smile after taking a single blow from me.

data.name: 0179 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um, Kyon… Are you okay??

data.name: 0180 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yep. I'm completely fine.

data.name: 0181 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It's just like in the scary story, I suddenly saw a face, and was really startled.

data.name: 0182 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Ah.

data.name: 0183 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So you're telling me it ended up playing out just like Haruhi's ghost story?

data.name: 0184 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm really sorry.

data.name: 0185 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not at all—it was all Haruhi's fault so…

data.name: 0186 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you saying? I'm heading back to the clubroom now.

data.name: 0187 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seeing Haruhi run off joyously with the camera in hand…

data.name: 0188 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …gives me an enormously disagreeable feeling.

data.name: 0189 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, has she ever told you ghost stories before?

data.name: 0190 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Of course, just ones related to North High.

data.name: 0191 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm afraid not. Only ordinary ghost stories that could happen anywhere, as far as I recall.

data.name: 0192 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So that means she told it just to intimidate Asahina…?

data.name: 0193 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't think that's likely, personally.

data.name: 0194 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If we grant that Haruhi's story became reality, could you really call that a coincidence?

data.name: 0195 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Either way—I've had enough of this experience.

data.name: 0196 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We should begin our preparations now, wouldn't you say?

data.name: 0197 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Preperations?

data.name: 0198 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I mean arranging for a truth that would satisfy Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0199 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like something to make her believe that the "unnatural phenomenon" was caused by it…

data.name: 0200 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Precisely. Although I'm not sure specifically what the best way to do that would be.

data.name: 0201 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Do you really have the ability to reveal Class 1-10?

data.name: 0202 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Regrettably, that's simply not possible with my power.

data.name: 0203 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You certainly sound sure of yourself.

data.name: 0204 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: With that said, there may still be a trick we could use to reveal the classroom.

data.name: 0205 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A trick?

data.name: 0206 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Something like swapping out the class number plates?

data.name: 0207 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, I don't think such a classic move would be able to fool Haruhi…

data.name: 0208 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's a fantastic idea.

data.name: 0209 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Are you serious?

data.name: 0210 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm very serious of course.

data.name: 0211 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I think so too.

data.name: 0212 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even you Asahina…?

data.name: 0213 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Do you usually look at the plate when you go to your classroom?

data.name: 0214 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not really—because of intuition, or muscle memory I guess.

data.name: 0215 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: So, you're not aware of the class plate, right?

data.name: 0216 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: If the plates were off by one, wouldn't you go in without noticing?

data.name: 0217 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Let's see… If the class at the far end is room six, then class seven should go…

data.name: 0218 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see—so class nine on the other side would be become a phantom class ten.

data.name: 0219 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes. That's why Kyon's idea is a good one!

data.name: 0220 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 発案者の俺自身、ちっともそんな 意図に気づかなかったのだが

data.name: 0221 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: まあ、結果オーライというやつだ

data.name: 0222 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: では、さっそくその方法で準備に 取りかかりましょう

data.name: 0223 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……ああ

data.name: 0224 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: そんな手で引っかかるかは疑問だが やってみる価値はあるかもな

data.name: 0225 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 困りました……手が届きませんね

data.name: 0226 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 教室から椅子か机を持ってくれば いいだろ

data.name: 0227 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: それが鍵が掛かっているようでして

data.name: 0228 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: まいったな……

data.name: 0229 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 何か足場になるものを探してきます

data.name: 0230 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: いっちまいやがった。そんな余裕も ないだろうに

data.name: 0231 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 朝比奈さん、提案があるんですが

data.name: 0232 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はい、なんでしょう？

data.name: 0233 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 俺が台になるんで、朝比奈さんが乗 ってプレートを外すのはどうです？

data.name: 0234 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ええっ、そ、それは……

data.name: 0235 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: あまり時間もないことですし、古泉 を待つのも面倒ですから

data.name: 0236 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: そ、そうですか……

data.name: 0237 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 心優しい朝比奈さん、俺を踏み台に するのをためらっておいでだが

data.name: 0238 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: このさい仕方がない

data.name: 0239 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 古泉を踏むのも踏まれるのもお断り だが、朝比奈さんなら問題ない

data.name: 0240 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: さあ、急いで下さい

data.name: 0241 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: わ、わかりましたぁ……

data.name: 0242 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: おそるおそる俺の背中に乗る朝比奈 さんだが、さすがに我らが天使だ

data.name: 0243 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 羽でも生えているかと思うほどに 軽くていらっしゃる

data.name: 0244 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: どうですか、届きますか？

data.name: 0245 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: もう少しで手が届きそうです

data.name: 0246 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: じゃあ、すこし伸びてみますよ

data.name: 0247 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ひゃうっ、ゆ、ゆれて怖いですぅ

data.name: 0248 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: すみません、ゆっくりも出来ない んで……

data.name: 0249 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: 指先が……なんとか届きそうです

data.name: 0250 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 頑張って下さい朝比奈さん

data.name: 0251 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: わわっ、キョン君っ、いきなり伸ば したらバランスがぁっ、ああぁっ！

data.name: 0252 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 大丈夫ですかっ朝比奈さんっ

data.name: 0253 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ひゃあっ！

data.name: 0254 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: うげ！

data.name: 0255 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: バランスを崩した朝比奈さんが足を 滑らし、俺の背中に落ちてこられた

data.name: 0256 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 天使降臨と言いたいところだが

data.name: 0257 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 頭にプレートまで落ちてきやがった

data.name: 0258 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: あつつつ……

data.name: 0259 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: キョン君っ、ごめんなさいっ！ 痛くないですか、大丈夫ですかっ？

data.name: 0260 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: い、いえいえ、平気ですとも

data.name: 0261 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ああっ、頭にプレートのあとがっ！ コブが出来てませんかぁ？

data.name: 0262 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 朝比奈さん、あなたの手でなでられ るだけで、タンコブなど即完治です

data.name: 0263 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: プレートは取れましたけど、付け替 えるのは大変そうですよねえ……

data.name: 0264 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: どうしましょう、時間が……

data.name: 0265 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: あまり時間もないし、やれることは 限られている。さあどうしたものか

data.name: 0266 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: もう一度だけ、再挑戦してみますか

data.name: 0267 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: 古泉くんが台を持ってくるまで 待った方がいいですよ

data.name: 0268 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: またあたしが転んだら、キョン君が 下じきになってしまいます

data.name: 0269 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: それはいいですけど、プレート直撃 はエンリョしたいところです

data.name: 0270 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: あっ、ポケットにばんそうこうが あったはず……

data.name: 0271 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はい、キョン君

data.name: 0272 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: あ、ありがとうございます……

data.name: 0273 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: コブに#P05“ばんそうこう”#P01が有効かは 知らないが……

data.name: 0274 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 朝比奈さんの気持ちだ ありがたくいただいておこう

data.name: 0275 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 時間もないですし、古泉を待つのも なんなんで、あきらめましょう

data.name: 0276 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: そうですか……役に立てなくて……

data.name: 0277 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: なんのなんの！ 朝比奈さんはこう してプレートをとって下さいました

data.name: 0278 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: #P05“６組のプレート”#P01がなんの役に 立つかはわからんが……

data.name: 0279 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 朝比奈さんが必死にとって下さった ありがたいプレートだ

data.name: 0280 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: なにかに使えるかも知れないから とっておこう

data.name: 0281 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 朝比奈さん、古泉をさがしながら 部室に戻りましょうか

data.name: 0282 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: はいっ

data.name: 0283 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: あー頭がジンジンする

data.name: 0284 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 朝比奈さんに声をかける

data.name: 0285 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 中止するように古泉に提案

data.name: 0286 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 再挑戦

data.name: 0287 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: あきらめる
